historical:
Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 17-353 validated a previously made technical correction by substituting "Council" for "Board".

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 13-150, see notes following § 32-1601.

For Law 17-353, see notes following § 32-101.

DC CODE § 32-1611

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Council shall ensure that the District's one-stop delivery system under the Federal Act is the foundation of local service delivery to employers and participants.
One-stop partners shall include the Income Maintenance Administration, Office of Early Childhood Development, and the Medicaid program.
